data.actual_result: For some reason it's in masculine gender (Український) and can't be changed via Crowdin because language names are baked in
data.expected_result: It should say 'Українська' (as it does on the right) because the word is in feminine gender
data.short_description: Ukrainian language name is written in the wrong grammatical gender (it's not a translation error)
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Settings - Go to Language tab - Scroll down all the way to Ukrainian - Observe the result on the left
